heading: HB03683
0: AN ACT REQUIRING EVERY INDIVIDUAL WHO IS SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX TO FILE A DECLARATION OF ESTIMATED INCOME FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF THE CURRENT YEAR ON OR BEFORE MAY 15 OF THE SAME TAXABLE YEAR, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 74 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8424, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1997', AS AMENDED
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2016-09-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03683
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING EVERY INDIVIDUAL WHO IS SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX TO FILE A DECLARATION OF ESTIMATED INCOME FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF THE CURRENT YEAR ON OR BEFORE MAY 15 OF THE SAME TAXABLE YEAR, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 74 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8424, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE 'NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1997', AS AMENDED
